security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-definition skill file containing only configuration and documentation. No executable code, scripts, or malicious behavior detected. Network access is limited to Linear's documented GraphQL API endpoint.

content.value_statement: Managing issues across multiple Linear projects requires manual API calls and constant context switching. This skill provides a unified interface to create, update, and track Linear issues directly through conversation with your AI assistant.
actual_capabilities: Create new issues with title, description, priority, and team assignment
Update issue status, priority, estimates, and other properties
Add comments and notes to existing issues
Query project status, progress, and issue counts
Manage labels and organize issues within projects
Retrieve team information and workflow states
limitations: Requires valid Linear API key and team ID for authentication
Cannot create or modify Linear teams or workspace settings
Limited by Linear API rate limits and permissions
Does not provide real-time notifications or webhooks

use_cases.title: Track sprint progress
use_cases.description: Monitor project progress and issue completion rates across multiple team workflows

use_cases.title: Quick issue creation
use_cases.description: Create and update bug reports and feature requests without leaving your development environment

use_cases.title: Prioritize backlog items
use_cases.description: Review and reprioritize issues based on team capacity and project progress data

prompt_templates.title: Create bug report
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new issue in Linear with title '[Bug]: Login fails on mobile', description 'Users cannot log in on iOS Safari version 15+. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open app 2. Tap login 3. Enter credentials 4. Error occurs. Expected: Login succeeds. Assign priority urgent and add the 'bug' label.'

prompt_templates.title: Update issue status
prompt_templates.prompt: Update issue ENG-456 status to 'In Progress' and set the priority to High. Add a comment that we started working on the fix.

prompt_templates.title: Check project health
prompt_templates.description: Get a snapshot of project status
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the current status of the Mobile App project including progress percentage, total issues, and completed issues.

prompt_templates.title: Bulk issue management
prompt_templates.prompt: Create 5 new issues for the Q2 roadmap: 1) 'Implement dark mode' High priority, 2) 'Add push notifications' High, 3) 'Performance optimization' Medium, 4) 'Update onboarding flow' Medium, 5) 'Accessibility improvements' Low

best_practices: Always verify the team ID before creating issues to ensure proper assignment
Use consistent priority levels (0-4) matching Linear's documented scale
Include reproduction steps in bug reports to help developers investigate faster
anti_patterns: Exposing API keys in conversation or logs - credentials should remain secure
Creating duplicate issues instead of searching for existing ones first
Using vague titles without prefixes like [Bug] or [Feature] for easy filtering

faq.question: What Linear plans support API access?
faq.answer: Linear's API is available on Free, Starter, and Business plans. Check your plan at linear.app/settings/billing.

faq.question: How many API requests can I make per minute?
faq.answer: Linear limits API requests to 100 per minute on average. Burst limits may apply during heavy usage periods.

faq.question: Can I integrate with existing Linear webhooks?
faq.answer: This skill does not provide webhook functionality. It interacts directly with the GraphQL API for CRUD operations.

faq.question: Is my Linear data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: All API requests go directly to Linear's servers at api.linear.app. No data is stored or forwarded elsewhere.

faq.question: Why is my issue creation failing?
faq.answer: Common causes: invalid API key, incorrect team ID, missing required fields, or rate limit exceeded. Check credentials and try again.

faq.question: How does this compare to Linear's official CLI?
faq.answer: This skill provides conversational issue management through AI. The official CLI offers more commands but requires terminal usage. Use both together for maximum productivity.
